item.title: XXE
item.author: quactv
item.description: What is XXE Types of XXE attacks XXE To retrieve files Example XXE through the XInclude tag Exploiting XXE using SVG Files or docx files or xlsx files XXE Into SSRF Blind XXE Payloads Note References What is XXE XXE = XML eXternal Entities XXE can occur when XML documents get parsed. We traditionally think of XXE vulnerabilities as uploading an XML file that includes an external entity, an example of this would be:
